channel.title: Cheaters In My Server!
channel.description: Hello I just recently got a visitor in my server and he some how got a phat set and my server is a non spawning server and ive checked a million times to make sure all my commands are admin only and he said "he got teleported and had the phats given to him at apetoll" anyone know of a cheat client that can give items and if so how can I stop it.

item.title: Cheaters In My Server!
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Threr are cheat clients that do this. And contrary to "dog eat dog"s view, you can stop them. Make a checking system for items. Iif the player randomly gets items he shouldn’t have, ban or delete the items.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheaters In My Server!
item.dc:creator: @Jonty Jonty
item.description:
@Jonty wrote:

Yes, I Had The Same Type Of Ppl On My Server…Cept, There Were About 5 Of Em…Banned Straight away.

Anyway, I Say, KILL EM ALL.

<3

item.title: Cheaters In My Server!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

better yet heres something easy i made up for this accastion

here it goes i made this on rune-server but here it is since i cant post it here

[QUOTE=blitz_9100;236274]ok i got sick of the wannabe way of stoping azn cracker so i posted the way to turn it on and off whenever you need it.

Purpose: To Stop Crackme,Without giving up the cracker fun

Difficulty: 4

Assumed Knowledge: how to open up client.java and replace some if statments,add voids and a int and command

Server Base: Project 16 v6(should work on all since they all have the same cracker void and stuff)

Classes Modified: Client.java

Procedure
Step 1: [i]
Find

customcommand
and under it put this

if (command.startsWith("crackeron") && playerRights >= 2)) {
setcrackeron();
cracking += 10000;
sendMessage("crackers have been turned on");

}
if (command.startsWith("crackeroff") && playerRights >= 2)) {
setcrackeroff();
cracking -= 10000;
sendMessage("crackers have been turned off");
}

[/i]

Step 2: [i]
then find

//Crackers
if (CrackerMsg == true) {
crackCracker();
}

and replace it with this one

//Crackers
		if(cracking > 1) {
		if (CrackerMsg == true) {
			crackCracker();
		}
	}

[/i]

Step 3: [i]
find

if(itemUseID == 962) {
int prize = Item.randomPartyHat();
int get = getprizes();
sendMessage("You crack the cracker...");
deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1);
p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you.");
if (get == 1)
{
sendMessage("You get the prize!");
addItem(prize, 1);
p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize.");
}
else
{
sendMessage("They get the prize.");
p2.addItem(prize, 1);
p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!");
}
}

and replace it with

if(itemUseID == 962) {
				if(cracking > 1) {
				int prize = Item.randomPartyHat();
				                        int get = getprizes();
										sendMessage("You crack the cracker...");
				                        deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1);
										p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you.");
				                        if (get == 1)
				                        if(cracking > 1) {
				                        {
				                        sendMessage("You get the prize!");
										addItem(prize, 1);
				                        p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize.");
	                        }
						}
					}
	                        else
	                        {
				if(cracking > 1) {
				int prize = Item.randomPartyHat();
				int get = getprizes();
				sendMessage("They get the prize.");
				p2.addItem(prize, 1);
				p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!");
	                        }
			}
	}

[/i]

Step 4: [i]
find

public boolean crackCracker() {
sendMessage("Somone used a crackers on you...");
CrackerMsg = false;
if (CrackerForMe == true) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1);
sendMessage("And you get the crackers item.");
} else {
sendMessage("but you don't have enough space in your inventory.");
}
CrackerForMe = false;
} else {
sendMessage("but you didn't get the crackers item.");
}
return true;
}

and replace it with

public boolean crackCracker() {
		if(cracking > 1) {
			sendMessage("Somone used a crackers on you...");
			CrackerMsg = false;
		}
		if(cracking > 1) {
			if (CrackerForMe == true) {
				if (freeSlots() > 0) {
					addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1);
					sendMessage("And you get the crackers item.");
				}
				} else {
					sendMessage("but you don't have enough space in your inventory.");
				}
				CrackerForMe = false;
			} else {
				sendMessage("but you didn't get the crackers item.");
			}
			return true;
	}

[/i]

Step 5: [i]
add this public int to your client.java

public int cracking = 0;

[/i]

Step 65: [i]
add these public voids

 public void setcrackeron() {
	        for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
	            if (p != null) {
	                client person = (client) p;
	                if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) {
	                    person.cracking += 1000;
	                }
	            }
	        }
	    }
	 public void setcrackeroff() {
	        for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {
	            if (p != null) {
	                client person = (client) p;
	                if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) {
	                    person.cracking -= 1000;
	                }
	            }
	        }
    }

[/i]

Credits: 100% me(blitz_9100)

Use: turn on to have crackers able to use and its already off when you log in

Proof: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NdU2TKydmoE[/QUOTE]

enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: Cheaters In My Server!
item.dc:creator: @dog_eats_dog dog eats dog
item.description:
@dog_eats_dog wrote:

There might be something at apetoll that spawns a set of phats. Maybe he found them. But yes there is a cheat client thats gives items. And u can’t stop it. Ban all users u think are using it and Have a nice day
